translations: v．偷听，窃听：在别人不知情的情况下，秘密地收听他们的谈话。

sentences.sentence: Everyone eavesdrops. "From four cubicles away we heard "Do not! "
sentences.translation: 随即我们听到从四个隔间以外传来的声音：“不要偷听！”

sentences.sentence: Back then, communities were not equipped with gutter systems, so houses were surrounded by eavesdrops, Spaces all around a building where water dripped from the eaves19.
sentences.translation: 那时候，由于许多居住区里都没有安装排水系统，人们就在房子四周留出一圈空地，叫“檐下滴水处”，从屋檐滴下的水便落到此处。
